definitions.definition: A line or straight passage , or the position of that which lies in a straight line.
Gunfire directed along the length of a target .
A series of doors that provide a vista when open .

main_definition: A line or straight passage , or the position of that which lies in a straight line.
secondary_definitions: Gunfire directed along the length of a target .
( architecture ) A series of doors that provide a vista when open .
